overview_of_class: COURSE DESCRIPTION / Introduction to the theory and practical application of discrete choice demand models including model formulation, estimation, specification testing and use of models in travel prediction. The course will also make an introduction to the statistical programming languages R and Biogeme. Practical problems are assigned to provide experience in handling real choice data, model estimation and model interpretation.
name: Travel Demand Analysis & Forecasting 1
subject: CIV_ENV
